ISSUE.TITLE: Multiple Application Links on Bitbucket Server override one another
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hello, We've got multiple drone deployments pointing to the same Bitbucket Server. The issue is that these application links seem to override one another. Creating / Updating one seems to alter/squash the other. Is there a workaround here? Can we change the name of the Application Link and the name of the Service Provider maybe?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: [CODE-2748]: Improve PR activity message for force push (#2975)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: [CODE-2728]: fix webhook internal url to not read from db (#2985) * fix: [CODE-2728]: fix webhook internal url to not read from db
